RJ's experiments are to collect data so I can form=C2=A0 conclusions based =
on objective results.=C2=A0 That may prove some theories true, or prove som=
e theories false.=C2=A0 Or show some theories are simply not testable. That=
 is not debunking. 

Read the groups main page for how Frank describes the =
group: "I invite anyone interested to join. I am not really scientific, I j=
ust 
take the approach, try different methods, see what works. I go on the =

results I get"

It doesn't say "Only for those who believe what we do".


=

    I realize you have plenty of subjective anecdotal

ng

ce and

And stop putting words in my mouth. A perso=
n can 
      misinterpret something, mistake something, or confuse somethin=
g, without 
      lying about something.=C2=A0 And before you jump down my =
throat claiming I 
      am saying all results are mistakes, I am not.=C2=

      experiments, keeping an open mind, and consideri=
ng all evidence I find. 
      

The way you have been attacking me by call=
ing me names at every 
      turn, just because I try new things and don't =
always agree with your world 
      view, is eerily reminiscent of the way =
the church of old tried to suppress 
      new thought and discoveries, exc=
ept you're just substituting the word 
      'heretic' with 'science'. and =
'blasphemy' with anything that disagrees 
      with you.

There's an old s=
aying:=C2=A0 "We become that which we 
      hate".=C2=A0 So far, all you'v=
e done is denounce people's efforts to try 
      new methods and see what =
works.=C2=A0 You accept nothing anyone else 
      proposes if it does not =
agree with you.=C2=A0 That is the realm of the 
      extreme skeptic: the =
same skeptic you ridicule.
=C2=A0
You certainly 
      don't have to agree =
with my comments.=C2=A0 And I don't have to agree with 
      yours.=C2=A0 =
But no one needs all the name calling Frank.=C2=A0=C2=A0 It 
      really a=
dds nothing to support your theories.

    <td valign=3D"top">I realize you have plenty of subjective anecdot=

ree with
